font-size: 6pt
font-size: 6pt
td.b: The goods and/or services covered by this invoice are subject to the Terms and Conditions of Sale available at www.abbeybusinessinteriors.co.uk

td.style: font-size: 6pt
td.b: ABBEY BUSINESS INTERIORS LIMITED RETAINS THE TITLE TO THE GOODS SUPPLIED UNTIL FULL PAYMENT HAS BEEN RECEIVED. HOWEVER RISK PASSES ON DELIVERY TO YOURSELVES

td.style: font-size: 6pt

tr.td: REG. COMPANY NO. 08914340 REG. OFFICE: Unit 23 Neptune Business Centre, Tewkesbury Road, Cheltenham, Gloucestershire. GL51 9FB VAT REG. No. 315 5984 82

pdf.body:
<#if record.item?has_content>



	

	Description
	Ordered
    ${salesorder.item[0].quantitybackordered@label}
	Shipped
	

<#if record.showAddlItemsPackSlip == 'NONE'><#list record.item as item><#list salesorder.item as tranline><#if tranline.line==item.orderline>
  <#if tranline.custcol_bbs_sales_print == true>
  
  <#if item.custcol_bbs_sales_generic_desc?has_content>
     <#assign desc = item.custcol_bbs_sales_generic_desc>
  <#else>
     <#assign desc = item.description>
  </#if>
  

	${desc}
	${tranline.quantity}
    ${tranline.quantitybackordered}
	${item.quantity}
	
    </#if>
	</#if></#list></#list><#elseif record.showAddlItemsPackSlip == 'ALL'><#list salesorder.item as tranline><#assign shipped=0><#list record.item as item><#if tranline.line==item.orderline><#assign shipped=item.quantity></#if></#list>
<#if tranline.custcol_bbs_sales_print == true>

  <#if tranline.custcol_bbs_sales_generic_desc?has_content>
     <#assign desc = tranline.custcol_bbs_sales_generic_desc>
  <#else>
     <#assign desc = tranline.description>
  </#if>	
  

	${desc}
	${tranline.quantity}
    ${tranline.quantitybackordered}
	${shipped}
	
  </#if>
	</#list><#elseif record.showAddlItemsPackSlip == 'UNFULFILLED'><#list salesorder.item as tranline><#assign shipped=0><#assign isInList=false><#list record.item as item><#if tranline.line==item.orderline><#assign shipped=item.quantity><#assign isInList=true></#if></#list><#if isInList || tranline.quantitybackordered != 0>
	<#if tranline.custcol_bbs_sales_print == true>
	
	  <#if tranline.custcol_bbs_sales_generic_desc?has_content>
     <#assign desc = tranline.custcol_bbs_sales_generic_desc>
  <#else>
     <#assign desc = tranline.description>
  </#if>
  

	${desc}
	${tranline.quantity}
    ${tranline.quantitybackordered}
	${shipped}
	
      </#if>
	</#if></#list></#if>
</#if>
